member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO
member.summary: Contains information about files in the specified directory. Used for directory handles. Use only when calling. The number of files that are returned for each call toGetFileInformationByHandleEx depends on the size of the buffer that is passed to the function. Any subsequent calls toGetFileInformationByHandleEx on the same handle will resume the enumeration operation after the last file is returned.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.NextEntryOffset
member.summary: The offset for the next FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFOstructure that is returned. Contains zero (0) if no other entries follow this one.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.FileIndex
member.summary: The byte offset of the file within the parent directory. This member is undefined for file systems, such as NTFS, in which the position of a file within the parent directory is not fixed and can be changed at any time to maintain sort order.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.CreationTime
member.summary: The time that the file was created.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.LastAccessTime
member.summary: The time that the file was last accessed.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.LastWriteTime
member.summary: The time that the file was last written to.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.ChangeTime
member.summary: The time that the file was last changed.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.EndOfFile
member.summary: The absolute new end-of-file position as a byte offset from the start of the file to the end of the file. Because this value is zero-based, it actually refers to the first free byte in the file. In other words,EndOfFile is the offset to the byte that immediately follows the last valid byte in the file.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.AllocationSize
member.summary: The number of bytes that are allocated for the file. This value is usually a multiple of the sector or cluster size of the underlying physical device.

summary.para: The file attributes. This member can be any valid combination of the following attributes:

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.FileNameLength
member.summary: The length of the file name.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.EaSize
member.summary: The size of the extended attributes for the file.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.ShortName
member.summary: The short 8.3 file naming convention (for example, "FILENAME.TXT") name of the file.

member.name: FILE_ID_BOTH_DIR_INFO.FileName
member.summary: The first character of the file name string. This is followed in memory by the remainder of the string.
